mapper.select: SELECT UM.MEM_NO, MEM_NAME, MI.ATTACHED_FILE_NAME FROM UNI_MEMBER UM LEFT JOIN MEM_IMG MI ON UM.MEM_NO = MI.MEM_NO WHERE UM.MEM_NO = #{memNo}

SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_PW , MEM_NAME , MEM_ROLE , MEM_EMAIL FROM UNI_MEMBER WHERE MEM_NO = #{memNo}
AND MEM_NAME = #{memName}

SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_NAME , DECODE(MEM_ROLE, 'ADMIN', '교직원', 'PRO', '교수', 'STU', '학생') AS MEM_ROLE FROM UNI_MEMBER
WHERE UPPER(MEM_NAME) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{memName})||'%'
